lead_paragraph: German police said on Sunday they had prevented a repeat of the assaults and robberies suffered by hundreds of women in Cologne a year ago by screening 650 mostly North African men on New Year's Eve.
snippet: German police said on Sunday they had prevented a repeat of the assaults and robberies suffered by hundreds of women in Cologne a year ago by screening 650 mostly North African men on New Year's Eve....

headline.main: German Police Say They Prevent Repeat of New Year Cologne Assaults
headline.print_headline: German Police Say They Prevent Repeat of New Year Cologne Assaults
